Heavy rain typically reduces the impact of wind on fire spread.  3. **Other Factors:**  Specific humidity and temperature are factors, but the predicted precipitation will have a more dominant impact on fire behavior in this scenario.   **In conclusion,**  the predicted significant rainfall strongly suggests a smaller active fire the next day, even with the presence of wind.
